000.description: A rich, green plain. Easy to traverse, but offers little defensive cover.

001.description: A body of water. Only naval and air units can traverse seas.

002.description: A paved road. Easy to traverse, but offers little protection.

003.description: A paved road. Easy to traverse, but offers little protection.

004.description: A steep mountain. Infantry units add 3 to their vision range from here.

005.description: In Fog of War, units hidden here can only be seen by adjacent units and air units.

006.description: A gentle flowing river. Only infantry units can ford rivers.

007.description: In Fog of War, units hidden here can only be seen by adjacent units and air units.

008.description: A sandy shoal. Lander units load and unload units here.

009.description: A Black Hole pipeline. Thick armour renders it indestructible. No units can pass it.

010.description: A Black Hole pipeline. The armor is weaker here than on other sections of the pipe.

011.description: A missile silo. Has a huge blast radius & unlimited range, but it can only fire once.

012.description: A normal city. Ground units gain supplies and HP in allied cities.

013.description: A base. Allied bases deploy, supply, and restore HP to ground units.

014.description: An air base. Allied bases deploy, supply, and restore HP to air units.

015.description: A naval base. Allied bases deploy, supply and restore HP to naval units.

016.description: Controlling a tower will grant all units you control +10% attack.

017.description: Similar to an HQ. A place where units are designed and developed.

018.description: A dangerous volcano that spews out molten magma on a daily basis.

019.description: Ground units can be supplied and replenished here. If an army's HQ is captured, they have lost the battle!
